directions: Whisk together the oil, vinegar, soy sauce, mirin, and sesame seeds in a small bowl, then set aside. Toss together the romaine, bok choy, carrot, almonds, and croutons in a large bowl. Pour the  dressing over the salad, toss to coat, and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 heads   baby bok choy, cleaned and sliced
title: Almond and Baby Bok Choy Asian Salad
